subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Clippers forward Elton Brand ruptured his left Achilles’ tendon yesterday during his daily workout. Brand, 28, will have surgery, but plans for the operation had not been completed, the Clippers said. Last month, Brand withdrew from the United States national team because of nagging injuries. He averaged 20.5 points and 9.3 rebounds last season.
